itemDescription: British organist, and Director of Music at Southwark Cathedral since 1989

wikipedia_page.main: Peter Michael Wright (born 6 March 1954) is a British organist, and former Director of Music at Southwark Cathedral from 1989 to summer 2019.  He was educated at Highgate School, the Royal College of Music and Emmanuel College, Cambridge where he served as organ scholar between 1973 and 1976.
